job.title: Automotive Test Engineer
job.description: Dynamic Research, Inc., a high-tech applied research firm based in Torrance, CA has an immediate opening for an analytically-oriented Test Engineer to work in the automotive industry.Assignments will includeConducting instrumented dynamic and Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) vehicle testing at our proving grounds near Bakersfield, CA and occasionally at the proving grounds of our clients (may at times involve night and weekend testing)Instrumenting and preparing vehicles for testingWriting test reportsDeveloping test softwareAnalyzing dataDesigning new test equipmentRequirementsBS or MS degree in Mechanical or Aerospace Engineering0 – 5 years of engineering experienceFamiliarity with MATLABStrong written and verbal communication skillsStrong automotive interestUS citizen or permanent residentStrongly desiredExperience with CADBackground in Dynamics and ControlFamiliarity with automotive sensors and data acquisitionMotorsports interest, including performance driving experience Dynamic Research, Inc. is headquartered in Torrance, CA and has an office in Shafter, CA near Bakersfield. DRI was established in 1979 and specializes in applied research, development, and consulting in the areas of vehicle dynamics and control, man-machine systems, ergonomics, biomechanics, and structural mechanics. In the automotive area this includes analysis, simulation, testing, and prototype design and development. DRI currently has a regular staff of 40, consisting of engineers and scientists, technicians, and support personnel. Dynamic Research, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
